title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: May Halfon
text: My name is May Halfon and I am an industrial-organizational practitioner.

title: Post With Code
text:

Codelibrary(tidyverse)

Codeibm_data <- read_csv("ibm_dataset.csv") |> 
  clean_names()

Code#ibm_data |> 
 # group_by(department) |> 
  #summarise(mean_job_sat = mean(job_satisfaction)) |> 
  #ggplot() +
   # geom_point(aes(x = fct_infreq(department),
    #           y = mean_job_sat))
 

  
  ggplot(ibm_data) +
    geom_jitter(aes(x = department,
               y = job_satisfaction), 
               width = 0.2, height = 0.2)






Code ggplot(ibm_data) +
    geom_jitter(aes(x = age,
               y = job_satisfaction, color = age), 
               width = 0.18, height = 0.18)






Code ggplot(ibm_data) +
    geom_jitter(aes(x = job_level,
               y = job_satisfaction, color = department), 
               width = 0.18, height = 0.18)






Code ibm_data |> 
   filter(department == "Research & Development") |> 
  ggplot() +
    geom_jitter(aes(x = age,
               y = job_satisfaction, color = over_time,), 
               width = 0.15, height = 0.15)






Code ibm_data |> 
   mutate(quit_status_label = ifelse(attrition == 1, "Quit", "Not Quit")) |>
   ggplot() +
   geom_jitter(aes(x = quit_status_label,
                   y = job_satisfaction, color = department))
